name: IT-House
description: Service based Company Website where different types of IT services are displayed. Users can view all services, select an IT service, choose a date and time slot, and book the service. They can also view their bookings, manage their profile, and add reviews from the dashboard. Admins have the ability to view their profiles, delete users, manage bookings (including deleting any unpaid services), and manage services (adding, removing, or modifying services) from the dashboard. Super Admins have the authority to create and delete admins.
technology: Nextjs, Redux, Ant Design Express,Mongoose ,JWT, Yup-Zod, React Hook Form Modular pattern RTK Query Axios

name: Lambo-parts
description: Tools Manufacturer Company Website where different types of tools is displayed.
technology: Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, React, React Router, React Query, Axios, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB, Securing Database using JWT, Firebase authentication,firebase hosting, Server hosting in Heroku.

name: Royal-bikes
description: Inventory Management system where different types of bikes are displayed.
technology: Users can add a bike and its details. Can see his bikes and Update bike quantity .

name: Mister-bd-gym
description: Gym Website where gym services facilities are shown. Users can click a service and see its details by logging in.
technology: Bootstrap. React, React Router, Firebase authentication.

name: Personal Finance
description: Monthly income expenses and savings calculation system

name: Influencer Products
description: A landing page showing common products an influencer uses these days.
